attributes.action: Ensure British traditonal/folk dance and music is represented at the 2012 Olympics
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see a commitment to ensuring that all traditional music and dance traditions represented in modern Britain are included in the Olympic celebrations. There is a rich tradition of music throughout the British isles, and among the ethnically diverse modern British population. I would like to see displays drawn from Scotland, Wales, Ireland, England and all the other ethnic groups that make up our modern British community.

rejection.details: Thisn is a matter for the London Organising Committe of the Olympic Games.
